title: Deep Learning for Vision
abstract: Neural networks for image recognition, convolutional architectures, and computer vision tasks.

title: Natural Language Processing
abstract: Techniques for understanding, generating, and translating human languages using transformer models.

title: Reinforcement Learning
abstract: Training intelligent agents through rewards and exploration in simulated environments.

title: Graph Neural Networks
abstract: Learning from structured data using graph-based methods and node embeddings.

title: Transformers in NLP
abstract: Attention mechanisms for large language models such as BERT and GPT.

title: Computer Vision and Object Detection
abstract: Detection and segmentation of objects using deep convolutional models and YOLO architectures.

title: Speech Recognition
abstract: Automatic transcription of spoken language using deep recurrent networks and transformers.

title: Transfer Learning in AI
abstract: Reusing pre-trained models for new tasks to improve learning efficiency and accuracy.

title: Optimization in Machine Learning
abstract: Gradient-based methods, Adam optimizer, and techniques to improve convergence.

title: Ethics in Artificial Intelligence
abstract: Challenges of fairness, transparency, and accountability in AI systems.
